song_lyrics: Māru ne tāru ā evī avḷāī;
Hoy sāchu te khoṭu kare... mane 1
E to sāthe nā eke rahe... mane 2
Kāmkāj kartā to navrā na thāye,
Sāgar tarang jem āve ne jāye;
Antar dharu chhu āp bīju na bhāve;
title: Swāmī mārā chho tame mane tamārā thāvu game

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-196: Sadhu Bhaktipriyadas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
